name: great t.v. show
reviewBody: This show was one of the best shows ever put on the air. sometimes it can be really corny but it is still one of the funniest shows i have ever seen. if you like boy meets world you might also want to check out watching growing pains, step by step, who's the boss, or full house. all are very funny shows and each are similar to boy meets world. My favorite character in the show would have to be eric because he is really funny. in the older episodes it he was really cool and down to earth , but when he gets older he acts really stupid and that is what makes it really funny. if you want to laugh you should watch this show. you will love it!
